citation_details.title: Comparing P300 flashing paradigms in online typing with language models
citation_details.author: N Chandravadia, S Pendekanti, D Roberts, R Tran
citation_details.abstract: The P300 Speller is a brain-computer interface system that allows victims of motor neuron  diseases to regain the ability to communicate by typing characters into a computer by thought.
citation_details.short_author: N Chandravadia, S Pendekanti, D Roberts, R Tran
